arts.ttl: Eintracht Frankfurt 1-5 Liverpool - FIVE THINGS WE LEARNED: The debate over star's starting spot is over, who Arne Slot needs to give his full support to - and where Reds must improve still
arts.sum: Liverpool regained the winning feeling with a comprehensive dismissal of Eintracht Frankfurt, ending a sequence of four-straight defeats.

arts.ttl: Eintracht Frankfurt shrug off two goals conceded off corners in Champions League loss: “Liverpool simply has taller players.”
arts.sum: Eintracht Frankfurt starters Mario Götze and Ansgar Knauff weren't in much of a mood to berate their team following Wednesday evening's Champions League loss to Liverpool. Eintracht head coach Dino Toppmöller, too, simply shrugged off two crucial goals conceded off corners within the span of five minutes.

arts.ttl: Eintracht Frankfurt 1-5 Liverpool: Reds Retaliate to Recent Slump with Emphatic Rout
arts.sum: Chiesa, Wirtz, and Szoboszlai all racked up the attempts for the Reds, whose emphatic response to their recent run of form continued to put pressure on Frankfurt. Wirtz would add his second assist of the evening only four minutes later, swivelling to set up Szoboszlai for a long range strike.

arts.ttl: Liverpool end losing run with dominant victory in Frankfurt
arts.sum: Liverpool ended a run of four straight defeats in all competitions with a dominant 5-1 victory at Eintracht Frankfurt in the Champions League.

arts.ttl: Why Eintracht Frankfurt will beat Liverpool in the UEFA Champions League
arts.sum: Eintracht Frankfurt welcome Premier League champions Liverpool to Deutsche Bank Park on Matchday 3 of this season's UEFA Champions League with every reason to believe they can enjoy another famous night in front of their fans in the competition. The stats back up Matthäus' assessment, with Uzun netting in all of his first five Bundesliga appearances this term as well as registering three assists.

arts.ttl: Confirmed UCL lineups: Eintracht Frankfurt vs. Liverpool
arts.sum: European football returns to Deutsche Bank Park as Eintracht Frankfurt host Liverpool in the UEFA Champions League. Here are the confirmed lineups of both teams.

arts.ttl: Eintracht Frankfurt v Liverpool: Champions League – live
arts.sum: ⚽️ Champions League updates from 8pm BST ⚽️ Flight delay adds to troubled buildup | Send Scott your thoughts After losing four matches in a row, Liverpool aren’t quite heading towards uncharted waters. But the map they’re referring to is old, yellow and fraying at the sides. Here’s a sequence Don Welsh’s side put together in the autumn of 1953 … Bolton Wanderers 2-0 Liverpool Newcastle United 4-0 Liverpool Liverpool 1-5 Preston North End Wolverhampton Wanderers 2-1 Liverpool Tottenham Hotspur 2-1 Liverpool Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Eintracht Frankfurt vs Liverpool - Champions League: Live score, team news and updates as Arne Slot's side look to get back to winning ways after four straight defeats with calls for Mohamed Salah to be DROPPED
arts.sum: Follow Daily Mail Sport's live blog for the latest score, team news and updates as Liverpool take on Eintracht Frankfurt at Deutsche Bank Park in the Champions League.

arts.ttl: Eintracht Frankfurt vs Liverpool LIVE: Champions League match stream, latest team news, lineups, TV, prediction
arts.sum: The Reds are verging on crisis after losing four matches in a row

arts.ttl: Eintracht Frankfurt vs Liverpool: TV channel, live stream, kick-off time, team news
arts.sum: Liverpool travel to Germany to face Eintracht Frankfurt in the Champions League on Wednesday night, with the Reds looking to end a four-game losing streak
